title: Cantonese Wonton Broth

frontmatter.title: Cantonese Wonton Broth
ingredients: 1 tbsp Dried Shrimp (The traditional source of 'ocean' umami)
2 stalks Green Onion, cut into 3-inch lengths
1 tsp Fish Sauce (Fallback if dried shrimp is unavailable)
Salt and white pepper to taste

kbSuggestions.title: Poultry low-temperature safety note
kbSuggestions.suggestion: This recipe references low-temperature cooking for poultry. Ensure it includes safe time/temperature notes (e.g., 60Â°C for 2 hours for pasteurization) or use higher temperatures to guarantee safety.

kbSuggestions.title: Recommend resting meat after high-heat cooking
kbSuggestions.suggestion: After searing/roasting, consider resting the meat for a few minutes (or longer for roasts) so juices redistribute and slices stay juicy.

kbSuggestions.title: Plating: add color or height when absent
kbSuggestions.suggestion: Consider a bright finishing garnish (herbs, citrus zest, pickles) or a crunchy element to add color and texture.
